title: SeqRisk: Transformer-augmented latent variable model for improved survival prediction with longitudinal data
details: M Öğretir, M Koskinen, J Sinisalo, R Renkonen… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: In healthcare, risk assessment of different patient outcomes has for long time been based on survival analysis, ie\modeling time-to-event associations. However, conventional approaches rely on data from a single time-point, making them …
